name: Suspicious Double Extension Files
description: Detects dropped files with double extensions which is often used by malware as a method to abuse the fact that windows hide default extensions by default.
query: (((file.path:(/.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp]/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Aa][Rr]/ OR /.*\.[Ll][Nn][Kk]/ OR /.*\.[Ii][Ss][Oo]/ OR /.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND file.path:(/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc]\..*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx]\..*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss]\..*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Xx]\..*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Pp][Tt]\..*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Pp][Tt][Xx]\..*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Gg]\..*/)) OR file.path:(/.*\.[Zz][Ii][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Aa][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND (NOT (file.path:(/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Rr][Ee][Cc][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Rr][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Rr][Ee][Cc][Ee][Nn][Tt]\\.*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(((file.path:(*.zip OR *.rar OR *.lnk OR *.iso OR *.exe) AND file.path:(*.doc.* OR *.docx.* OR *.xls.* OR *.xlsx.* OR *.ppt.* OR *.pptx.* OR *.jpg.*)) OR file.path:(*.zip.exe OR *.rar.exe)) AND (NOT (file.path:(*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Office\\Recent\\* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Recent\\*))))`
